name: Burger Man
description: Burger Man is the product of a 100% American father's love for fun, family, and some good old-fashioned food! Based in Edgeville.

name: Fred's Froyo
description: Get your froyo (frozen yogurt) at Fred's, here we serve the best frozen treats in Edgeville! Been the best around since '89!

name: McWonald's
description: Burgers and chicken galore! Get your favorite snacks from McWonald's today! 20% off for children under 13 until the end of September.
